item.title: Old message from my ex
item.description: I guess I had enough time to think of shitty yesterday. I remember I told you not to breathe a word about ours to anyone. So what do you wanna show off ? What do you think when inviting me with your friend ? Are you too serious ? Well, you may not know, but I'm still a young little girl, wearing a pink pyjama, sleeping with mom when being scared of murderers... I don't know how to behave "properly" in the presence of your friend. Cuz I'm with you, not with your friend. I guess, perhaps you're serious with me, and wanna introduce me to your friend ? If yes, thank you, but it's not my duty to keep up your appearance. So what did you blame on me ? You have poor past but I don't ? Wanna a comparison between our tragedies ? Oh, maybe you don't have tragedies but me. See, you're something really boring to others, but I see sth interesting inside you. You just want everyone see how poor you are ?? Have you ever care about how everyone injure around you ? You're really boring. I don't force you to understand me, but do you think it necessary ? And I know a million people like you, trying to contact with nobody, wanting everybody know you clearly ? All I acted was my natural essence. You want me to behave like this, my manner like that... I can't change myself and I don't want too. Oh, I think I'm happier with my girlfriends. And you'd better find a more maturing girl than me, or the best is a man.

item.title: Mua laptop

Äáº§u tiÃªn lÃ  táº£i nÃ³ vá» tá»« github, giáº£i nÃ©n ra thÆ° má»¥c nÃ o Ä‘Ã³ mÃ  báº¡n cÃ³ quyá»n truy cáº­p. LÃ m váº­y Ä‘á»¡ bá»‹ dÃ­nh máº¥y láº±ng nháº±ng vá» permission khi táº¡o trá»±c tiáº¿p trong /srv/http, tÃ´i chÆ°a lÃ m web thá»±c thá»¥ vÃ  cÅ©ng khÃ´ng giá»i láº¯m vá» system admin nÃªn báº¡n Ä‘á»«ng cÆ°á»i =)) . Giá» thÃ¬ chmod cho tmp vÃ  logs cá»§a nÃ³ 775, náº¿u khÃ´ng nÃ³ khÃ´ng log Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘Ã¢u.

Cáº¥u hÃ¬nh cÆ¡ sá»Ÿ dá»¯ liá»‡u: Máº·c Ä‘á»‹nh cá»§a nÃ³ lÃ  mysql, Ä‘Ã´i khi ta cáº§n enable má»™t vÃ i module trong php.ini nhÆ° pdo, intl, mysql Ä‘á»ƒ nÃ³ lÃ m viá»‡c Ä‘Æ°á»£c. Chá»‰nh file config/app.php táº¡i pháº§n Datasource Ä‘á»ƒ phÃ¹ há»£p vá»›i cáº¥u hÃ¬nh cá»§a báº¡n, dá»… thÃ´i, cá»§a tÃ´i trÃ´ng tháº¿ nÃ y:


'Datasources' => [
'default' => [
'className' => 'Cake\Database\Connection',

'persistent' => false,
'host' => 'localhost',
/**
* CakePHP will use the default DB port based on the driver selected

* the following line and set the port accordingly
*/
// 'port' => '3306',
'username' => 'root',
'password' => '',
'database' => 'cake_bookmarks',
'encoding' => 'utf8',
'timezone' => 'UTC',
'cacheMetadata' => true,

/**
* Set identifier quoting to true if you are using reserved words or

* decreases performance because each query needs to be traversed and

*/
'quoteIdentifiers' => false,

/**

//'init' => ['SET GLOBAL innodb_stats_on_metadata = 0'],
]

TÃ´i khÃ´ng khuyáº¿n khÃ­ch viá»‡c sá»­ dá»¥ng acc root, nhÆ°ng lÃ m trÃªn mÃ¡y cÃ¡ nhÃ¢n thÃ¬ khÃ´ng váº¥n Ä‘á» gÃ¬ láº¯m. ÄÃ³ lÃ  do Ä‘Æ°á»ng dáº«n chÆ°a Ä‘Æ°á»£c cáº¥u hÃ¬nh Ä‘Ãºng Ä‘áº¯n. Giá» má»Ÿ 1 cÃ¡i terminal, cd tá»›i thÆ° má»¥c cá»§a dá»± Ã¡n vÃ  lá»‡nh ./bin/cake server . Lá»‡nh nÃ y khá»Ÿi Ä‘á»™ng server, nÃ³ sáº½ in ra Ä‘iáº¡ chá»‰ cho ta truy cáº­p vÃ  liÃªn tá»¥c hiá»ƒn thá»‹ 1 cÃ¡i log Ä‘á»ƒ ta theo dÃµi cÃ¡c tÃ i nguyÃªn Ä‘Æ°á»£c truy xuáº¥t. Vá»›i tÃ´i, Ä‘á»‹a chá»‰ lÃ  localhost:8765 . Giá» truy cáº­p vÃ o, náº¿u táº¥t cáº£ Ã´ test Ä‘á»u Ä‘Æ°á»£c Ä‘Ã¡nh dáº¥u tick OK thÃ¬ tá»©c lÃ  á»•n rá»“i Ä‘Ã³.
